author: newsr.in
title: Nawazuddin Siddiqui: Never ever dreamed that will be working with Amitabh
text:
Talented actor Nawazuddin Siddique, confirming his next project with megastar Amitabh Bachchan but not disclosing any further details, said he had never ever dreamed he would get this chance.*Nawazuddin Siddiqui*
"I am very much fortunate to work with Mr. Bachchan. I have never even thought in my dream that he would wish to ... Â»
